SELECT A.REP_ID , D.REP_NM , D.SVN_REP_URL , D.REP_TYPE_CD , A.REP_RV , A.REP_TARGET_RV , C.REP_COMMENT , C.REP_CMT_DATE , C.REP_CMT_AUTHOR , A.REP_CHG_ID , A.TICKET_ID , A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD , SF_CMM1001_COM_CD_INFO('REP00004', A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD, '1') AS REP_CHG_TYPE_NM , A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH , A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM , A.REP_CHG_FILE_KIND FROM REP1101 A INNER JOIN ( SELECT REP_ID, MAX(REP_RV) AS MAX_REP_RV, REP_CHG_FILE_PATH, REP_CHG_FILE_NM FROM REP1101 WHERE 1=1 AND TICKET_ID = #ticketId# GROUP BY REP_ID, REP_CHG_FILE_PATH, REP_CHG_FILE_NM ) B ON (A.REP_ID = B.REP_ID AND A.REP_RV = B.MAX_REP_RV AND A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH = B.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH AND A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM = B.REP_CHG_FILE_NM) INNER JOIN REP1100 C ON (A.REP_ID = C.REP_ID AND A.REP_RV = C.REP_RV AND C.TICKET_ID = A.TICKET_ID) INNER JOIN REP1000 D ON (A.REP_ID = D.REP_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.TICKET_ID = #ticketId# AND C.REP_RV_TYPE_CD = #repRvTypeCd# AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM REP1101 WHERE 1=1 AND REP_ID = A.REP_ID AND TICKET_ID = A.TICKET_ID AND REP_TARGET_RV = A.REP_RV AND REP_TARGET_FILE_PATH = A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH )
AND A.REP_CHG_FILE_KIND = #repChgfileKind#
AND UPPER( D.REP_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( A.REP_RV ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( C.REP_CMT_AUTHOR ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD = #searchCd#
ORDER BY C.REP_CMT_DATE DESC, A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM, A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD

AND A.REP_ID = #repId#

sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO REP1100 ( TICKET_ID , REP_ID , REP_RV , REP_RV_TYPE_CD , REP_COMMENT , REP_CMT_DATE , REP_CMT_AUTHOR , REP_CHG_FILE_CNT ) VALUES ( #ticketId# , #repId# , #repRv# , #repRvTypeCd# , #repComment# , TO_DATE(#repCmtDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , #repCmtAuthor# , #repChgFileCnt# )

SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_REP_CHG_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_REP_CHG_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'CHG' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_REP_CHG_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(REP_CHG_ID) AS NEW_REP_CHG_ID FROM REP1101 A WHERE 1=1 AND REP_ID = #repId# AND REP_RV = #repRv# AND REP_CHG_ID LIKE 'CHG' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
